info.name: Irini Luxury Rooms
info.description: Irini Luxury Rooms enjoys a great time
info.longDescription: Irini Luxury Rooms enjoys a great location, just a 5-minute walk from Diocletian's Palace and Split Riva. Guests can grab a bite to eat at the restaurant or enjoy a hot stone massage, aromatherapy or Ayurvedic treatment. Split Port and Split Marina are also a short drive away.
